short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display ONLY products that qualify for PRIME delivery on Amazon.co.uk.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
VERSION UPDATE NOTE: Since Amazon changed its layout ( new grey banner theme ) I had to update the plugin to be specific to the Amazon.co.uk site - I have also noticed that under some circumstances it will be required to delete the extension  and reinstall.

This extension makes it easy to get search results on Amazon.co.uk that list only items that qualify for Amazon Prime ( free delivery ).

The extension places a stylish "Prime" toggle within the search bar on Amazon.co.uk. Clicking the "Prime" logo Enables or Disables the feature ( indicated by a small radio button ).

This is a very small extension that has virtually NO impact on browsing speed.

Supported Amazon sites:
Amazon.co.uk

I will create another extension that works on other Amazon sites.

Permissions required by this extension:
Read and change your data on Amazon.co.uk

How it works:
How this extension works is easy, it looks to see if you are on any of the Amazon sites listed above, if you are it adds the "Prime" button in the search bar of Amazon. If not it does nothing. It enables "Prime Results" by appending the search URL with "rh=i:aps,p_76:419158031".

NOTE:
This extension also adds my Affiliate ID into search results. This means that I get a small percentage of purchases you make from Amazon ( costs you no more ). Hope this is OK.

Version History:
1.0 - Initial release.
1.1 - Logo changes and code edits.
1.2 - Further code and image optimization. Updated description with more details. Also added screenshot and video.
1.3 - Updated extension to support Amazon's new site layout and Prime search options. Also made it specific to Amazon.co.uk site ( sue to the different layouts used by Amazon across its sites now ).
Updated screenshot to reflect new Amazon.co.uk look.
I will create separate extensions for other countries soon.
